Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的除了逐一介紹工商組織心理學各種常用方法之外，並針對每一方法提供了豐富的各種工商組織心理學應用範例，期望同學在修習完畢後，不僅了解工商心理學的主要方法，更重要的是讓同學藉由這些工具學習解決企業勞資關係問題的能力，對創造企業的競爭優勢有所認識。
description.en: This curriculum main goal besides introduced one by one the industrial and organizational psychology each commonly used method, and aimed at each method to provide the rich each kind of industrial and organizational psychology, expected the schoolmate after repaired the custom to finish, not only the understanding Industrial and organizational psychology main method, more importantly let the schoolmate affiliation by these tool study solution enterprise Industrial Relations questions abilities, to create the enterprise the competitive advantage to have the understanding.

name.en: Introduction to industrial and organizational psychology

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，由組織在經營的關鍵作用，課程中以品牌與組織理論探討品牌行銷與組織策略的重要議題。課程內容包含品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、組織設計、組織權力、組織政治、組織文化。身為公司經營者，面對國際多變化環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷與組織經營決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding marketing and organization strategy as they are used in a wide variety of settings in business markets. The topics covered in this class include: brand equity, brand marketing, brand competition, organization design, organization power, organization polices, organization culture. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand and organization decisions under the internationalized and changeable environment.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎，物理系統的數學模式，控制器的種類，時域分析，穩定性分析，根軌跡法，頻率領域的分析，控制系統的設計。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402025或負責教授同意底盤動力系統，行駛阻力、驅動力、煞車制動傳動等之計算車懸吊系統分析（懸吊系統、汽車垂直振動分析、系統參數調整），汽車轉向系統，ABS 煞車系統，整合系統。
description.en: Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹語言研究之重要議題並探討當前研究趨勢，含括主題如下：（一）應用語言學：語用學、言談分析、社會語言學、語料庫語言學、詞彙學；（二）外語教學：第二語言習得、科技與英語教學、內容本位語言教學、多元文化與跨文化英語教學；（三）專業英文研究與教學：科技寫作、企業/觀光/科學/醫療/管理英語、專業英語課程創新設計；（四）翻譯研究：口筆譯理論與實務、口筆譯教學、翻譯與科技、影視翻譯、新聞翻譯；（五）雙語教育：英語授課、學科內容與語言整合教學、雙語教師之養成。
description.en: This course aims to introduce major research issues and current trends in language studies. Possible topics include, but are not limited to, the following: (1) applied linguistics: pragmatics, discourse analysis, sociolinguistics, corpus linguistics and phraseology; (2) foreign language teaching: L2 acquisition/SLA, technology and English education, content-based instruction and multi-/cross-cultural issues in English education; (3)ESP research and teaching: technical writing, English for business/tourism/medicine/technology/management, and innovations in ESP curriculum design; (4) translation studies: theory and practice of translation and interpretation, translation and interpretation teaching, translation and technology, audiovisual translation and news translation; (5) bilingual education and bilingualism: English medium instruction (EMI), content and language integrated learning (CLIL) and bilingual teacher development.

name.en: Issues and Trends in Language Studies

notes: 每次上課3小時，共6週；將邀請系上6位教師共同授課。

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其對學校評鑑相關議題的興趣，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in school evaluation. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in school evaluation.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 本課程將教授學生FPGA程式開發、硬體系統設計、和如何利用FPGA加速深度學習演算法。課程大綱如下:1. Xilinx & Vivado開發環境2. High-level Synthesis (HLS) & SystemC 程式開發3. Finite Impulse Response (FIR) Filters4. Discrete Fourier Transform & Fast Fourier Transform5. Matrix Multiplication6. Prefix Sum and Histogram7. Video Systems8. Deep Learning Implementation on FPGA9. Pruning & Quantization10. Object Detection on FPGA
description.en: This course teaches FPGA programming, hardware system design, and how to implement and accelerate Deep Learning Algorithms on FPGA. The syllabus is shown below:1. Xilinx & Vivado IDE2. High-level Synthesis (HLS) & SystemC3. Finite Impulse Response (FIR) Filters4. Discrete Fourier Transform & Fast Fourier Transform5. Matrix Multiplication6. Prefix Sum and Histogram7. Video Systems8. Deep Learning Implementation on FPGA9. Pruning & Quantization10. Object Detection on FPGA

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1. 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。2. 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。3. 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrices and Determinants, Eigenvalue problems. 2. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms. 3. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value Problems.

description.zh: 本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
description.en: Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

notes: 限學號雙數號學生選課

description.zh: 本課程使學生對燃料電池的基本原理、關鍵技術、以及商品化發展與應用過程，有所瞭解並加以分析及探討。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池簡介、燃料電池之效率、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池之計算實例。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basic principles of the fuel cell, key technologies, and the commercialization of the development and the application process, and to analyze and discuss the design of fuel cell system.Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell, Fuel cell efficiency, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Calculation example of fuel cell.

description.zh: 1. 建立企業經營策略的基本認知 2. 學習企業經營轉型與創新策略3. 分享企業經營策略案例 4. 提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1. Establish basic understanding of business management2. Learn business transformation and innovative strategies3. Share cases of enterprise management strategies4. Promote student’s management ability

notes: (群組1)經營與策略管理(聯輔會) (許婉琪、李瑞珠、謝

description.zh: 本課程只在針對互聯網發展下如何釐清其中關鍵議題如什麼是互聯網、互聯網核心思維、互聯網與物聯網之區別、互聯網影響哪些行業、傳統性企業如何在物聯網時代轉型、及其未來之發展。之後其中之理論及各產業之應用案例之研討亦包含其中。
description.en: This course will focus on the development of the Internet for how to clarify the key issues such as what is the Internet, the Internet core thinking, the difference between the Internet+ and the Internet of Things, the impact of the Internet on which industry, how traditional enterprises in the era of things transition, and its future development. After which the theory and the application of the case study of the industry also includes them.

description.zh: 本行為經濟專題課程: 1.	介紹全球總體經濟以及政經情勢探討: 從消費、投資、政府支出、進口、出口、外匯、利率、失業率、政府政策、地理位置等方面來分析經濟行為以及決策行為。2.	介紹管理者或一般大眾在作決策時，會產生的心理偏誤。另外，也提供管理者或一般大眾如何避孼心理偏誤，並改善其決策程序，以心理學的角度來探討。3.	從總體經濟數據中，找出可行投資方向。4.	運用幾位諾貝爾經濟學獎得主之文章，來介紹公司(個人)行為決策5.	公司或個人如何利用期貨選擇權來進行公司(個人)理財投資行為之介紹
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence for the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged over the past two decades. Behavioural Economics starts from the premise that, in the real world, investors do not follow the rational assumptions which underlie the EMH. Behavioural Economics has developed to try to explain financial market anomalies which could effect the functioning of these markets.

notes: (群組2)組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度

description.zh: 本課程首先介紹社區的階層意義及規劃程序及方法，其次舊社區規劃的主要內涵包括土地使用規劃、運輸規劃、公共設施規劃各以理論發展及案例操作說明，尤其是土地使用與運輸規劃之整合及鄰避性公共設施規劃案例之舉證。在就社區規劃後之整體開發方式說明，如何由二度的平面規劃成為三度空間的開發。期中考後將針對更前瞻性及更細緻的規劃技巧作為授課的內容，包括生態社區規劃的方法、災害及防災規劃，並舉科技的發展包括網際網路及捷運之發達對社區規劃的衝擊及因應。最後舉全球化及競爭力對社區發展的影響。另外以本人服務於實務界多年，得由同學指定欲瞭解或探討的課題由教師準備講授，以增加共同討論的意願，冀讓同學能對生活的空間有個全貌的初識。二個學分的課程僅能讓同學對環境有所管窺，希望加上其他的課程，讓同學進而因之他、關懷他、愛他而願意以專業與他結緣終生，那怕我們沒有好的居住環境！
description.en: This course is an introduction on the meaning of community hierarchy, the procedure and methodology of planning, as well as theoretical developments and case studies regarding major planning issues such as land use, transportation, and case studies on NIMBY facilities.Furthermore, I will also demonstrate planned unit developments and how to transform a two-dimensional planning into a three-dimensional development.After the midterm, I'll focus on more foresighted and deliberate planning techniques, including ecological community planning methods, disaster-preventive, planning, and the possible coping measures with respect to the impacts resulting from technological advances such as the internet and the mass transit systems.
